img_above_text:
![Gall Gem .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Gall_Gem_.jpg)| Gall Gem| Uncommon | Using the Gourd moderately increases Poison Resistance for a short duration | Defeat the enemy harassing the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Gall Gem
![Celestial Lotus Seeds .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/df/Celestial_Lotus_Seeds_.jpg)| Celestial Lotus Seeds| Rare | For a brief moment after using the gourd, slowly recovers a small amount of health | Found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Celestial Lotus Seeds
img_below_text:
![Copper Pill .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f0/Copper_Pill_.jpg)| Copper Pill| Epic | After using the gourd, the next Rock Solid cast costs no mana for a short duration | Found by a statue on the hill after the Tiger Vanguard fight at Crouching Tiger Temple - Temple Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge| Copper Pill
![Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/26/Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg)| Iron Pellet| Rare | Using the gourd can no longer be interrupted by incoming attacks and now provides considerable Damage Reduction | Purchased from the Man-In-Stone after defeating him and completing his quest in Yellow Wind Ridge| Iron Pellet

You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Gall Gem .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Gall_Gem_.jpg)| Gall Gem| Uncommon | Using the Gourd moderately increases Poison Resistance for a short duration | Defeat the enemy harassing the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Gall Gem

        - Following Text: "![Copper Pill .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f0/Copper_Pill_.jpg)| Copper Pill| Epic | After using the gourd, the next Rock Solid cast costs no mana for a short duration | Found by a statue on the hill after the Tiger Vanguard fight at Crouching Tiger Temple - Temple Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge| Copper Pill
![Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/26/Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg)| Iron Pellet| Rare | Using the gourd can no longer be interrupted by incoming attacks and now provides considerable Damage Reduction | Purchased from the Man-In-Stone after defeating him and completing his quest in Yellow Wind Ridge| Iron Pellet"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the **Celestial Lotus Seeds**, a rare item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. According to the preceding text, this item provides a brief health recovery effect after using the gourd. It is found at the **Shen Monkey Vendor** located in the **Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine** in **Black Wind Mountain**. The item is part of a series of consumables with unique effects tied to gourd usage.
